title: BSE 720
intro: Provides a focused concentration on gross anatomy via literature review and intensive cadaver dissection related to the studentâ€™s specific clinical interest. Topics will emphasize clinical conditions that have clear anatomic correlates. Key topics will include the 3D relationships of gross anatomical structures, foundational anatomical knowledge required to interpret results of different imaging modalities, and the application of anatomical knowledge in carrying out surgical, diagnostic, or therapeutic clinical procedures.
